Structs/PromptConfig.html#/s:14Testimoni.name: defaultConfig
Structs/PromptConfig.html#/s:14Testimoni.abstract: A default PromptConfig instance with stock strings, styles, and colors.

Structs/PromptConfig.html#/s:14Testimoni.name: init(commentStrings:storeReviewStrings:thankYouStrings:submitButton:commentField:tintColor:tintColorDark:)
Structs/PromptConfig.html#/s:14Testimoni.abstract: Creates a PromptConfig with optional overrides for any subset of its configuration values.

Structs/PromptConfig.html#/s:14Testimoni.name: copy(commentStrings:submitButton:commentField:tintColor:tintColorDark:)
Structs/PromptConfig.html#/s:14Testimoni.abstract: Returns a copy of this configuration with selectively overridden values.

Structs/PromptConfig/TextField.html.name: TextField
Structs/PromptConfig/TextField.html.abstract: Configuration for the comment text field’s shape, variant, and size.

Structs/PromptConfig/Button.html.name: Button
Structs/PromptConfig/Button.html.abstract: Configuration for the prompt’s submit button shape, variant, and size.

Structs/PromptConfig/CommentStrings.html.name: CommentStrings
Structs/PromptConfig/CommentStrings.html.abstract: Localized strings for the comment step of the prompt.

Structs/PromptConfig/StoreReviewStrings..name: StoreReviewStrings
Structs/PromptConfig/StoreReviewStrings..abstract: Localized strings for the App Store review prompt step.

Structs/PromptConfig/ThankYouStrings.htm.name: ThankYouStrings
Structs/PromptConfig/ThankYouStrings.htm.abstract: Localized strings for the final thank-you screen.

Structs/PromptConfig.html.name: PromptConfig
Structs/PromptConfig.html.abstract: Encapsulates all customizable configuration for the in-app feedback prompt.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:14TestimonialKit8.name: verbose
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:14TestimonialKit8.abstract: Verbose = most detailed logs, Debug = developer-focused info, Info = general info,
Compares two log levels by their raw value to determine ordering.

Enums/PromptResult.html#/s:14Testimonial.name: cancelled
Enums/PromptResult.html#/s:14Testimonial.abstract: The user dismissed the prompt without submitting a rating.

Enums/PromptResult.html#/s:14Testimonial.name: completed
Enums/PromptResult.html#/s:14Testimonial.abstract: The user submitted both a rating and a comment (if applicable).

Enums/PromptResult.html#/s:14Testimonial.name: redirectedToStore
Enums/PromptResult.html#/s:14Testimonial.abstract: The user was redirected to the app store after submitting a rating, with or without a comment.

Enums/PromptResult.html#/s:14Testimonial.name: storeReviewSkipped
Enums/PromptResult.html#/s:14Testimonial.abstract: The user skipped the store review process and dismissed the prompt.

Enums/AppEnvironment.html#/s:14Testimoni.name: production
Enums/AppEnvironment.html#/s:14Testimoni.abstract: The production environment, used for live deployments with real users.

Enums/AppEnvironment.html#/s:14Testimoni.name: staging
Enums/AppEnvironment.html#/s:14Testimoni.abstract: The staging environment, typically used for pre-production testing and QA.

Enums/AppEnvironment.html#/s:14Testimoni.name: development
Enums/AppEnvironment.html#/s:14Testimoni.abstract: The development environment, used for local development and testing.

Enums/AppEventType.html#/s:14Testimonial.name: positive
Enums/AppEventType.html#/s:14Testimonial.abstract: Indicates a positive event or interaction, such as a favorable action or feedback.

Enums/AppEventType.html#/s:14Testimonial.name: negative
Enums/AppEventType.html#/s:14Testimonial.abstract: Indicates a negative event or interaction, such as an unfavorable action or feedback.

Enums/AppEventType.html.name: AppEventType
Enums/AppEventType.html.abstract: Represents the sentiment type of an application event.

Enums/AppEnvironment.html.name: AppEnvironment
Enums/AppEnvironment.html.abstract: Represents the runtime environment configuration for the application.

Enums/PromptResult.html.name: PromptResult
Enums/PromptResult.html.abstract: Represents the possible outcomes after a user interacts with a prompt.

Enums/LogLevel.html.name: LogLevel
Enums/LogLevel.html.abstract: Defines the various log levels supported by the SDK, ordered by verbosity.

Classes/TestimonialKit.html#/s:14Testimo.name: trackEvent(name:score:type:metadata:)
Classes/TestimonialKit.html#/s:14Testimo.abstract: Records an application event that can influence prompt eligibility and analytics.

Classes/TestimonialKit.html#/s:14Testimo.name: promptIfPossible(metadata:promptConfig:completion:)
Classes/TestimonialKit.html#/s:14Testimo.abstract: Checks backend eligibility and, if allowed, presents the inâ€‘app feedback prompt.

Classes/TestimonialKit.html.name: TestimonialKit
Classes/TestimonialKit.html.abstract: Public entry point for the TestimonialKit SDK.
